name: Army Chess Free
description:
***Introduction
Army Chess is a two-player board game that simulates army wars. It is a very popular game around the world, especially in China, where it is called Junqi (军棋) and several generations have been spending their recreation time on it.

***Army Chess Family has 8 different versions with 7 different game modes and 6 different game types.

*** 8 Versions：
1.Pro
2.Standard
3. SZY
4.Online
5.Super Online
6.Super Online SZY
7. Mac Pro
8. Mac Super Online

*** 7 Game Modes
1. Single Player Mode,
2. Two Players Mode,
3. Local Net Mode
4. Online Mode (Game Center with Auto-match, Inviting-friends)
5. Super Online Mode (Asynchronous or Synchronous via Game Center)
6. Referee Mode,
7. Playback Mode,

***6 Game Types
1. Rank Visible Type,
2. Rank Blind Type,
3. Mixed Type,
4. Attack Visible Type,
5. Half Blind Type,
6. Mixed Visible Type.

(See detailed descriptions of 2 tables in Chinese below where Versions, Modes and Types are described in the same order as above.)

***Features
1) Compatible among different versions ( SZY and Paid,，iOS and Mac OS)。
2) Fully supports four languages of Chinese, English, Japanese and Traditional Chinese for menus, messages and piece text. The player can select his own language even his opponent chooses a different one.
3) Supports full screen play without scarifying functionalities and convenience. All this is made possible by the original idea that makes the board movable.

(Chinese)
8.5版主要更新内容
---------------------
◉加强了单机算法
◉扩大了游戏功能
◉改善了用户界面
◉新增了单机榜单

一、简介
军棋是一款在中国家喻户晓的,模拟战争的双人棋类游戏。本军棋系列共有8个不同版本，7个游戏模式，6个游戏类型。

各版本支持的功能如下2表。

表1:游戏模式 (Table 1: Game Modes)
　游戏模式|单人|双人|局网|在线|超级|公证|回放
军棋 Pro　| Yes |Yes | Yes| Yes| Not| Yes| Yes
军棋　　　| Yes |Yes | Yes| Yes| Not| Yes| Yes
军棋 SZY　| Yes |Yes | Yes| Yes| Not| Yes| Yes
军棋在线　| Not | Not| Not| Yes| Not| Yes| Yes
超级在线　| Not | Not| Not| Not| Yes| Yes| Yes
超级 SZY　| Not | Not| Not| Not| Yes| Yes| Yes
Mac Pro　| Yes | Yes| Yes| Yes| Not| Yes| Yes
Mac 超级　| Not | Not| Not| Not| Yes| Yes| Yes
(Yes支持　　Buy可升级支持　　Not不支持)

表2；游戏类型 (Table 2: Game Types)
　游戏类型|明棋|暗棋|暗糊|碰明|半暗|明糊
军棋 Pro　| Yes | Yes| Yes| Yes| Yes| Yes
军棋　　　| Yes | Yes| Yes| Not| Not| Not
军棋 SZY　| Yes | Yes| Yes| Yes| Yes| Yes
军棋在线　| Yes | Yes| Buy| Buy| Buy| Buy
超级在线　| Yes | Yes| Buy| Buy| Buy| Buy
超级 SZY　| Yes | Yes| Yes| Yes| Yes| Yes
Mac Pro　| Yes | Yes| Yes| Yes| Yes| Yes
Mac 超级　| Yes | Yes| Yes| Yes| Yes| Yes
(Yes支持　　Buy可升级支持　　Not不支持)


表1中的游戏模式说明如下
单人模式；人机对战
双人模式；同机对战
局网模式;局域网络和蓝牙内对战
在线模式：通过Game Center的速配和邀请朋友的方式对战方式
超级在线：通过Game Center可同步也可不同步地对战方式
公证模式：充当公证人的功能
回放模式：回放历史游戏的功能

表2中的游戏类型说明如下
明棋：棋子大小互见
暗棋：棋子大只限己见
暗糊棋：随机布局的暗棋
后明棋：棋子大小在对战后互见
半暗棋：最后两排棋子的大小只限己见
明糊棋：随机布局的明棋


五、特点介绍
1)跨版本共享排行榜和成就榜(付费和免费，iOS和MacOS)。
2)跨版本对战(同上)。
3)首创动屏，增加棋盘可推动功能,突破了画面尺寸的限制。
4)全面支持4种语言：中文，英文，日语和繁体中文。
